page.title: 04A TRIP TO STROOD
page.content: Iam a visitor from America. I came to Strood because I have friends here. It is very interesting. TUESDAY I got up at 9 a.m to go swimming at Strood Swimming Pool. This was very enjoyable. I had a go at diving off the high board. After this we drove down the town to do a spot of shopping. We went into Shoppers Paradise, they have this new system there, all they have to do is pass the item that is being brought across a hole with a cross (called a Bar Code Reader) on it and the price comes up on the till. We decided to have dinner in the Wimpy where we sat down and ordered cheeseburger and chips with a chocolate milkshake and the waiter brought us these.
